ModMetaData.name: Community Core Library - Vanilla Tweaks
ModMetaData.author: RimWorld CCL Team
ModMetaData.description:
v0.15.0
Requires Community Core Library v0.15.0
Compatible with RimWorld builds: 1273
Makes optional changes to the core game objects.
This mod is optional but recommended (by the CCL modding team, but we're biased).
